data.name: Star Renegades: Total Lunarcy
data.detailed_description:
Sick and tired of being unable to communicate with their Prime Dimension, the Imperium has begun setting up LUNAR BASES to establish quantum communication arrays! This could spell doom for the multiverse of rebellions fighting back against their oppression! So fire up your shuttle, grab the closest flag to your person and strap yourselves into your favorite pair of moon boots because "J5T-1N, we have a problem" and the only way to solve it is by going to the moon!

  • New dungeon: the Lunar Base!
  • You can access this dungeon when you encounter a teleporter on one of the main mission planets of each run.
  • The Lunar Base has its own special unique equipment rewards, as well as a special Quantum Funnel, that allows you to unlock Hero Perks from other dimensions!
  • New Behemoth: The Demolisher
  • New Cards: "Lunar Cakes" and "Moonstruck"
data.about_the_game:
Sick and tired of being unable to communicate with their Prime Dimension, the Imperium has begun setting up LUNAR BASES to establish quantum communication arrays! This could spell doom for the multiverse of rebellions fighting back against their oppression! So fire up your shuttle, grab the closest flag to your person and strap yourselves into your favorite pair of moon boots because "J5T-1N, we have a problem" and the only way to solve it is by going to the moon!

  • New dungeon: the Lunar Base!
  • You can access this dungeon when you encounter a teleporter on one of the main mission planets of each run.
  • The Lunar Base has its own special unique equipment rewards, as well as a special Quantum Funnel, that allows you to unlock Hero Perks from other dimensions!
  • New Behemoth: The Demolisher

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
